definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
to take out of the furnace/fresh out of the oven/fig. newly announced/recently made available
lit. the stove fire has turned bright green (allusion to Daoist alchemy) (idiom)/fig. (of an art, a technique etc) brought to the point of perfection
lit. to set up a separate kitchen (idiom); to start from scratch/back to square one/to start of on a new path

sentences.english: We settled in, getting the wood stove going and then propping our boots around it to dry.
sentences.chinese: 我们安顿下来，生起木柴炉，把靴子放在炉边烤干。

sentences.english: Preheater and calciner is key equipment for precalcing production technique.
sentences.chinese: 预热器和分解炉是新型干法水泥生产技术的核心设备。

sentences.english: The green production with hot rotating furnace and tunnel stove roast.
sentences.chinese: 该机生产的生坯采用热风旋转炉及隧道炉烤均可。

sentences.english: VD electric furnace is a king of degasification equipment from molten steel during steel making process.
sentences.chinese: VD炉是冶金行业冶炼过程中的一种钢液脱气设备。

sentences.english: Each forged parts and cap screw with Batch code links to Test Certificate sheet.
sentences.chinese: 每一个锻造部件都带有相对应的炉号和检测证书。

sentences.english: This furnace is used at the Anshan Iron and Steel Co. as demonstration furnace.
sentences.chinese: 该炉在鞍钢弓长岭球团厂获得成功应用并成为示范炉。

sentences.english: Toast walnut kernels in medium hot oven, remove and cool.
sentences.chinese: 合桃肉放焗炉内，用中火焗至金黄，取出待冻。

sentences.english: Four new crematory are commissioned at the fu shan crematorium.
sentences.chinese: 富山火葬场四个新火化炉投入服务。

sentences.english: Where have you used the portable gas-fired cooker?
sentences.chinese: 你曾经在哪些地方使用可携式气体炉呢？

sentences.english: Urine-Determination of chromium-Graphite furnace atomic absorption spectrometric method.
sentences.chinese: 尿中铬的石墨炉原子吸收光谱测定方法。

sentences.english: In this paper four gasifiers were evaluated by this method.
sentences.chinese: 文中用这一方法评价了四种煤气化炉。

sentences.english: Put it into the oven at 170 degrees centigrade for one hour .
sentences.chinese: 把它放进170摄氏度的炉中一个小时。

sentences.english: The bagua style refers to that in which all buildings surround the danlu, a stove to make elixirs.
sentences.chinese: 八卦型指的是围着炼丹炉的所有建筑物的布局。

sentences.english: Using quartz ceramic roller is the successful crux of furnace for glass horizontal tempering.
sentences.chinese: 采用石英陶瓷辊子是水平钢化玻璃炉成功的关键。

sentences.english: I cooked outside -- rain or shine -- on a rocket stove I made.
sentences.chinese: 无论晴雨天，我都用自制的火箭炉在户外做饭。

sentences.english: New cremators commissioned at the Fu Shan Crematorium.
sentences.chinese: 富山火葬场新火化炉投入服务。

definition: to open a furnace/to start up a furnace
ancient cooking cauldron with two looped handles and three or four legs/pot (dialect)/to enter upon a period of (classical)/Kangxi radical 206/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes
variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
copper (pure copper, as opposed to alloy)
tinder/source of a fire/inflammable material/(fig.) spark (of a revolution etc)
